title: Lunarmancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Link someone to the full moon at night.
- Choose to blot out tonight's full moon during the day (3 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone that you link may only perform their ability on a full moon night.
- Blotting out the full moon during the day will cause the following night to act as a non-full moon night. This does not affect any other types of moons, such as Blood Moons or Harvest Moons; however, these moons will not count as a full moon. Don't question it too much.

desc:
Post 2516
*He only comes out at night.*
Roleblock Immunity
